front.title: Common Label and Label Request Specification for Automatic Switched Transport Network

abstract.t: This draft completes the [GMPLS-REORG] draft and details technology specific issues. It proposes different approach and enhancement to [GMPLS-SIG] and [GMPLS-SIGEN]. Changes are: -- New set of Signal Type structures of ETSI-PDH, ANSI-PDH, SONET, SDH and OTN for Generalized Label Request [GMPLS-SIG]. -- G-PIDs associated each signal type for G-Label Request. -- Label Channel ID [GMPLS-REORG] field structure.
